summary:
Do you like blood and gore? Carnage? Decapitations? Cut off limbs and non stop combat?
If yes, then you are one sick puppy and this mod was designed with your bloodthirsty cravings in mind.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Satisfy[/font][/b][/size][size=6][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] your[/font][/b][/size][size=6][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] thirst[/font][/b][/size][size=6]...[/size]
[size=6][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] [/font][/b][/size]
[size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] In the [b][i]Arena[/i][/b][/font][/size]



Do you like blood and gore? Carnage? Decapitations? Cut off limbs and non stop combat?
If yes, then you are one sick puppy and this mod was designed with your bloodthirsty cravings in mind.

This mod adds an Arena to which you can teleport at any time you wish and you will always be greated by
an endless amount of blood thirsty fighters.
The teleport spell marks the location where you used it and when you leave the
arena you will be teleported back to the same place where you first cast it. It's follower compatible.
The only other thing you need to know is that everytime Altern dies 10 times, a new enemy will spawn.

How do i get there?!
There is a book in the riverwood inn which teaches you the teleport spell.


The truth is that this mod is a peace of shit, but combine it with the mods bellow and
and the Arena will be the most visited place by you in skyrim.

Step one:
Download and install these mods, they will make your skyrim combat experience AMAZING, i mean it!
I do not own any of those mods listed here apart from Arena but i am publicisng them because they fucking deserve it.


skse - latest version, instal this first
http://skse.silverlock.org/

SkyUI - you will need those to run the mods bellow.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?


Deadly Mutilation - the best gore mod out here.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34917/?

The dance of death - more killmoves, more control over killmoves, trust me its worth it.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10906/?


No spinning death animation - bethseda still haven't fixed that "bug"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17214/?

TkDodge - adds a dodge mechanic to the game, hard to get hang of at first but once you do, it will be very satisfying.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20923/?


Combat speed - allows you to change global combat speed, this mod is one of a kind, set it to around 150
and it will add a whole new depth to fighting and will make combat fast paced and challenging.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40315/?


enchanced blood textures - Makes blood more realistic, the darker settings are best in my opinion.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?


Few tips when it comes to the instalation of above:
 - make a clean save inside an interior like an inn, before you install anything
 - make sure you downlaoded the compatible versions with your other mods if you have any
 - Install skse and then sky ui and everything else apart from dance of death and deadly mutilation.
 - instal deadly mutilation, load your game set your settings for the mod in the mcm.
 - finally instal dance of death, to make this mod compatible with deadly mutilation set killmove chance to bellow 50 % for best results.

Step two:
Put the script folder and the arena.esp in your skyrim data folder

Go to the Arena and enjoy ;)
author: HailHell
